Reviews.Title: A hopeful choice
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my twelve year old son whose last cell phone didn't survive a water-ride at Six Flags.  While it does not have a Qwerty keyboard for texting, I am hoping that it is waterproof and can withstand the abuse from an active soon-to-be teenager who is a competitive swimmer and carries a phone in his pool bag to practice.  The built-in flashlight is a nice added feature and has already been put to good use.The phone appears to be very sturdy, but I am not sure whether the plug-in area for the charger is really waterproof.  The battery and sim card area does look waterproof.  The phone is compatible with AT&T; in the United States.  This saved us from having to purchase a new phone and phone plan from AT&T.;  We were able to purchase a sim card from AT&T; and have the phone operational in minutes.The phone is solid black as identified in the written description.  The red stripe on the illustration is not on the phone.  The company that sent the phone did so very quickly-- I did not pay for an upgrade in delivery.

Reviews.Title: From Russia With Love?
Reviews.Author: PeteCress
Reviews.Content: I am in the USA.Just took delivery on a Samsung B2100 from HassleFreeCell.The order summary says "Samsung B2100 Unlocked Quad-Band Phone, Extreme Anti-Shock, Waterproof, Built-in Flashlight, Bluetooth - Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Black".That being said: all printed materials are in Russian and the charger appears tb Euro standard (with the two round prongs).Somebody tossed in a purely-physical adapter but the phone gives no indication of charging even with the adapter.  Experimentation with another adapter - that up-converts voltage and works withe the phone - suggests that the supplied adapter is inadequate bco the voltage issue.Sent an email to their support address, got back the usual automated acknowledgement.  That was yesterday.EDIT: 2011 12-12-------------------Got an email response today (the first business day after my email)They acknowledged that sometimes the instructions books are in the wrong language and supplied a link to a download site.  They also offered to ship a U.S. charger at no cost.Based on this response, I would upgrade HassleFreeCell to four stars.After all, stuff happens, no matter who one is dealing with - and the real measure of service is what they do when stuff does happen.Good job guys!

Reviews.Title: b2100 phone
Reviews.Author: alquell
Reviews.Content: very nice and easy to use and it was one phone i order found to be true to the adds i read and love it alot  iwas very happy with the seller and they were fast and the service i rec was alsome . sending one to my nice in nv today . thanks everyone

Reviews.Title: Christmas present
Reviews.Author: Diana E. Shouse "dshouse"
Reviews.Content: This was a great Christmas present for my husband. He absolutely loves it. It is rugged and just right for his large hands

Reviews.Title: Very nice phone
Reviews.Author: Precious Shopper
Reviews.Content: This was a very nice phone and the service was great.  Had to return because to small for my husband but they took it back with no hassle at all

Reviews.Title: dangerous.
Reviews.Author: hayu
Reviews.Content: The phone over heated in my pocket. I felt it getting hot and took it out. Idon't know it would burned me. Now It has static and I have tried re booting all the time.I received this as a gift so I don't have a receiptI don't have the boxIt's not pristine in right of the box new.I got it in the phone in Jan.You have to pay going both ways.

Reviews.Title: Works well, but came with European charger
Reviews.Author: Sacaudos
Reviews.Content: We received this cell phone about a week ago with French set as the default language and a European charger. I understand French, so had no trouble changing the settings. The instruction manual includes English, so if you don't know the language set by default, it is easy to change. As for the European charger, I don't mind having it because I plan to use the phone in Europe as well, but it is inconvenient for most people to have to add an adapter to the end of the charger (even if adapters are cheap to buy). Fortunately, I have another Samsung cell phone with a US charger that works with this phone, so now I have a charger for use in the US and in Europe.The flashlight works fine. It comes with a slot for a lanyard or key ring, too. Works just fine on the T-Mobile pay as you go ($0.10/min.) plan and should work fine on Vodafone and other inexpensive pay-as-you-go services in Europe (at least my other Samsung does).

Reviews.Title: great phone but...
Reviews.Author: Madeline
Reviews.Content: East European phone used on AT&T; mostly DC to NY. Great phone for just voice and text.  Very good battery life and extremely sturdy.  However, the phone delivered was the basic black rather than the red highlighted one.

Reviews.Title: ATT configuration error
Reviews.Author: MrS
Reviews.Content: Simple phone which is great but with capabilities one can't use.  No beef with call clarity and battery life.  Can send text but not send or receive one with pictures - get a configuration error which 2 different ATT store employees and phone support couldn't solve.  Couldn't access bluetooth capability either.The durability and water resistance were the main reason for purchase and so far so good.  Just wanted to let people know, with ATT, at least, this phone can't access all of its features.  Other than that, it is a good, simple phone and delivered in a timely manner from the seller.

Reviews.Title: Bad Speaker
Reviews.Author: Jay Jordan
Reviews.Content: The phone seemed good at the start, but there were many situations where it was impossible to hear. I had many phones in the past, as you can imagine but this one was the worse.It was supposed to have noise cancellation technology which would have helped. Maybe it was defective. It was so bad that I had no choice but to return the product. The service for returning worked , but it was not seamless. We also had to pay the shipment going back.

Reviews.Title: do not buy this product from hassle free
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product from HASSLE FREE CELL through amazon. The item heading is US but I got a phone with Russian instructions and a charger that requires and adapter to utilize in the US. The company is aware that the product is not made for the US as evidenced by the fact that they threw an adapter in the shipping bag. I am still awaiting a response from the company.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint
Unlocked Quad-Band Phone GSM 850/900/1800/1900 with GPRS and EDGE capabilities
Waterproof and shock resistant; stylishly rugged design; outdoor-friendly features; Flashlight and Noise cancellation.
Bluetooth; FM radio; 1.3 Megapixel Camera; Video Player and Recording; MP3 player and MicroSD card slot.
Talk time Up to 9 hs, Stand-by time Up to 600 hs.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung B2100 Unlocked Quad-Band Phone, Extreme Anti-Shock, Waterproof, Built-in Flashlight, Bluetooth - Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Black
